title: [安全|管理|传送]PlotsMenu —— 配合PlotSquared的地皮快捷GUI菜单插件[1.8-1.10.2]
author: 神の手
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 17:54 编辑 
排版是什么瘠薄，我已经放弃了


***权限节点***
plotsmenu.compass // 得到一个开启菜单指南针(如果你的配置文件没问题)
plotsmenu.admin.commands // 可以看到管理员的命令
plotsmenu.admin.give // 给予玩家一个开启菜单工具
plotsmenu.command.plotsmenu // 主命令权限
plotsmenu.command.news // 查看插件的大新闻！
plotsmenu.command.menu // 玩家打开菜单的权限***
plotsmenu.admin.dump // 可以使用dump命令





旧版介绍
于插件更新改动较大，下面是仅适用于1.0版本的老介绍，留作纪念。PlotsMenu 1.0——快捷的地皮菜单插件
比起用ChestCommands一个个设置快捷指令，不如试试这个插件
-

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 snowclay 于 2017-1-3 18:44 编辑 

试了试放弃了。。。这个作者没有充分考虑到plotsquare的功能
首先添加玩家的权限只是添加了在线时候的权限，当地皮主离线就没有权限了
这个也是主要功能。。既然这个功能都不好使就不如用chestcommands做了..

replies.author: snowclay
replies.txt_content:
纠正你一下.
/pm 会和私聊冲突
/plotmenu是插件提示
/menu会和chestcommands默认菜单冲突..
这就很尴尬了

replies.author: 神の手
replies.txt_content:
snowclay 发表于 2017-1-3 18:13
纠正你一下.
/pm 会和私聊冲突
/plotmenu是插件提示
:/我是按原贴翻译的
原贴说了/plotmenu可以用/pm和/menu代替
这就好比Plotsuquared与PlayerPoint，前者的主命令是/plotsquared，后者是/playerpoint但是二者都可以用/p代替，很明显感觉这种冲突是很常见的事情啊，稍微避开就好了_(:зゝ∠)_再说有的服务器不装CC菜单呢_(:зゝ∠

这就好比Plotsuquared与PlayerPoint，前者的 ...
这个插件有问题的..等作者再更新再说好了
不全是指令问题，插件本身也有问题

LadyHaley  Version: 1.2
this plugin has some great potential and i hope the author releases a new version soon. 

unfortunately half of the functionality does not work, thankfully the basic player commands do seem to be working. not only that but there's no way to disable gaining the compass on join and you cant get rid of it without the clear inventory command. 

The last update was a year ago, when will the re code be released? if there's a 1.10.2 version but not a 1.11 then release it so we can see that there's progress.

I really like this plugin but its a shame that its so broken at this point in time and in a development freeze.

I do hope you continue developing this plugin because it is really useful and mostly a must have.


Some changes that need to be made are the following

1. add more options in the config
2. fix the broken commands like aplotsmenu and plotsmenu canceltravel
3. have an option to to be able to remove the compass from our inventories without needing the clear inventory command.
Nov 30, 2016复制代码

等等再看吧，目前看和用cc做出来的原理差不多，优势就优势在add不用输指令了，可惜只能add不能trust
